content:
Could someone look at the on_disk_cache.rs part of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/72121?
I'm not too familiar with incremental and stable hashing and don't have time to dig into this in more detail.

I'm ready to answer questions about other parts of the PR and hygiene infra.
The most important part is that ExpnId and SyntaxContext are IDs that are sequentially assigned IDs (similar to NodeIds) that are not stable between compilations.
(Assigning @Santiago Pastorino as someone in management role.)
I posted my thoughts on the PR itself, here.
